REIGNSOUNDXL: ATAAH KING, GBSTM, IIIAMDE$$, JUSS JABZZ, ReignsoundSM Records ― Sony® Music

GLOBAL ― Rapper ATAAH KING in collaboration with Grillz by ScottyTM, IIIAMDE$$, and JUSS JABZZ; plans to rejoin Sony®.

Published on: Saturday, May 3, 2025 – Set for redistribution on: June 17, 2025

ReignsoundSM News GitHub® Schedule

Editor’s Note: This is an official press release by REIGNSOUNDXLTM covering ReignsoundTM Records rapper ATAAH KING. See the CHANGELOG for a list of revisions and ongoing edits.

Prior to his trial, ATAAH KING, the Not OneTM and Favorite RapperTM rapper, was in talks with Sony®, via AWAL® and The Orchard®, regarding the release of a forthcoming project.

The project, a cinematic continuation of 50 Cent’s Get Rich or Die Tryin‘®, was set to reimagine the genre-defining debut through the lens of an emerging icon in the modern era.

This release was intended to follow a promotional campaign titled the Year-Long Singles Run project, in which the rapper would release singles weekly for a year.

Initially the project was abruptly halted due to legal challenges, but the rapper and his team have continued efforts to resume business as planned.

Check out ReignsoundSM Press for the full press release, continued updates, and exclusive drops.
